alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 8:42PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Talbot and southwestern Caroline Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 841 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Oxford, or 10 miles north of Taylors Island, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Easton, Talbot, Trappe, St. Michaels, Preston, Oxford, Tanyard, Harmony, Tilghman Island, Copperville, Matthews, Choptank, Hambleton and Windyhill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for eastern Maryland.
